entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
